titleInfo.title: All In for the Gambler, Kenny Roger's Farewell Concert Celebration

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing All in for the Gambler, Kenny Roger's Farewell Concert Celebration with Dolly Parton Reba McEntire, Christ Stapleton, Little Big Town, Lady Antebellum, Lionel Richie, Alison Krauss, and others at the Bridgestone arena on October 25.
